p:
The cell death mechanism by flow cytometry assays demonstrated that BRP crude extract and its fractions, and biosynthesized AuNPs induced the death mainly by apoptosis. The percentage of apoptosis ranged between 44 and 66% related to the total of dead cells for all treatments (Fig.Â 10). Begnini et al.
100 described BRP induced apoptosis in 5637 cells by molecular ways related to the P53 and Bax/Bcl-2. Another study conducted by Novak et al.
85 demonstrated that BRP components induced cell cycle arrest of B16F10 in G2/M that triggers the apoptosis pathways activation.
